resources.string: Hi, how can I help you?

"Hello there!"

All the location data recorded by the app are encrypted using the AES algorithm and stored solely on the phone. No personal information will be shared with a third party. There will be no leak of sensible information when the phone is lost.

If you have any questions about the app, please feel free to contact me at kwangjing@gmx.com

Special thanks to the folks who created the Java Opencsv library that makes parsing csv files such a breeze. The Opencsv library is liscenced under the Apache 2 liscence.

Details on the app, as well as the source code can be found here on GitHub. The app and all its related materials are licensed under the MIT license:
